Income tax department rolls out new functionality in AIS

The Income Tax Department has now rolled out a new functionality in AIS to display the status of the information confirmation process.

In AIS, a taxpayer has been provided with a functionality to furnish feedback on every transaction displayed therein.

This new feature in the Annual Information Statement (AIS) allows taxpayers to provide direct feedback about the transactions shown in their statement, enhancing transparency and user interaction with the income tax reporting system.

The article was published by PTI (Press Trust of India) on May 13, 2024.
title:
The income tax department on Monday said it has rolled out a new functionality in the Annual Information Statement (AIS) through which taxpayers will be able to view the status of information confirmation process.

AIS is populated based on the financial data received from multiple information sources and provides details of a large number of financial transactions undertaken by the taxpayer that may have tax implications.
